snoopy.blindnote: SNORD62A and a second exact copy, SNORD62B, reside in the same host gene (KIAA0515 hypothetical protein). sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA A590 : SNORD62A SNORD62B (20100707末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Tycowski, K. T., Smith, C. M., Shu, M. D., and Steitz, J. A. (1996). A small nucleolar RNA requirement for site-specific ribose methylation of rRNA in Xenopus. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A, 93, 14480-14485. Sequence :
